item.description:
• NOVEMBER VegWorcester General Interest Meeting
  • This will be our 6th general meeting and its is open for current members and new members, volunteers, or people who are just curious to find out what VegWorcester is all about!   
  • We'll do a go-around and introduce ourselves and get to know eachother, and we will talk about what we've been up to as a group, fall campus outreach, vegan thankgiving, movie showings, ideas for fall/winter fundraising and events and we'll have some ways for you to get involved or volunteer for VegWorcester in the upcoming winter.
  • We'll also do a small casual vegan potluck if anyone wants to bring something...  remember that all ingredients should be vegan (no meat, milk, dairy, eggs, gelatin, etc) and you should bring plates/utensils if needed. But don't worry if you can't bring anything, just feel free to show up!

 

  • There is also a Facebook Event for this: https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=167378670016295

For more info:

  • manda@vegworcester.com
  • http://www.vegworcester.com    
  • http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in Atwood 301, on the 3rd floor..which is above the big theatre building. (Campus Map: http://www.clarku.edu/campusmap)
item.name: VegWorcester November General Meeting
